text: Sano litaka (lyele lisikuli) lichiwala ni lilanguka lya Mâ€™mbujegwe (Allah, ndema jatachiyika kukwiilanya magambo), ni chichiwichidwa chitabu (chamasengo ga wandu), ni taachiyika nao Achimitume kwisa soni mboni, ni kuchijilanyisyidwa chilikati chao mwakuonaonape, soni wanganyao ngasatendedwa lupuso
